alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:23PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ferry County through 100 PM PDT... At 1223 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Sherman Pass. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davis Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
